title: Crew Show! Bronco Sport, Civic Type R, motorcycle bug outs!
description:
Matt Farah and Zack Klapman sit down to talk about their recent tests of the Honda Civic Type R, Ford Bronco Sport Badlands, and Kia Telluride. We also talk about Zack's new bugout vehicle, Matt's Ducati loaner, and Tesla's NHTSA issues. 

 

Re-shop your rates and you could save up to $1,055. Head to Policygenius.com to get started right now.

https://www.policygenius.com

Goodguys Rod & Custom Association is kicking off car show season with its first event of the year at Texas Motor Speedway this weekend, March 12-14th. Go to good-guys.com to find tickets and more information about the show.
